home.injaunja:
"injaunja is a startup that provide platform for immigrants and travellers to
connect with hosts from their homelandoffering culturally familiar
accommodations and vehicle rentals
 and finding fellow travellers and tour
 organizers. Our initial focus is on the
 Iranian community abroad, leveragin
 our familiarity with Iranian culture to
 ensure comfort and trust.",
home.ServiceDescription:
injaunja connects immigrants and travellers with hosts from their homeland,
offering culturally familiar short-term accommodations and vehicle rentals.
Users can also find travel partners to share their journeys and split expenses, making the experience more enjoyable and cost-effective. 
Additionally, the app allows users to organize tourist tours.
Each version of the app is available in the local language, ensuring ease of use.
